duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and oversee complex Requests for Information (RFIs)/RFPs/Requests for Quotations (RFQs) with internal and external customers.
Direct the preparation of complex ERs, Statements of Work (SOWs), Specifications, and Schedules.
Lead and manage complex proposals, develop proposal/contract strategy, and lead negotiations with customers.
Function as the primary point of contact for the review, edit, composition, and interpretation of contract documents, requirements, and agreements.
Execute contracts, agreements, and certifications within authorized delegation on behalf of the company.
Coordinate and provide guidance for contracts from time of signature to closeout.
Maintain and foster close business relationships with internal and external customers, act as the primary liaison between external customers and the company for contractual matters.
Perform management activities, including recruitment, selection/hiring, performance assessments, employee recognition/discipline, and career development.
Direct, schedule and plan activities required to manage multiple concurrent proposals and contracts, ensuring self-governance and compliance with company policies and procedures.
Provide input, adapt, and improve business processes/practices to meet company goals and satisfy customer needs.
Perform significant business management tasks on behalf of Contracts or Finance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration or a related field required; MBA preferred.
Prefer expert knowledge of FAR/DFARS, CAS disclosure statement, ITAR, FPCA, and policies and procedures.
Prefer NCMA Certified Federal Contracts Manager (CFCM), Certified Professional Contracts Manager (CPCM), and/or other professional certification in Government contracts.
